negative.title: Blinded
descriptions: You automatically fail any ability check requiring sight.

negative.title: Charmed
descriptions: You can't attack your charmer or target them with harmful abilities or magical effects.

negative.title: Deafened
descriptions: You automatically fail any ability check which requires hearing.

negative.title: Frightened

ifs.if: Can you see source of fear?

descriptions: If you can see the source of your fear, you attack and roll ability checks at Disadvantage.
You can't willingly move closer to the source of your fear.

negative.title: Incapacitated
descriptions: You can't take Actions, Bonus Actions or Reactions.

negative.title: Paralyzed
descriptions: Any attack that hits you is a critical hit if the attacker is within 5 feet of you.

negative.title: Petrified
descriptions: Your weight increases by a factor of ten, and you cease aging.
You are unaware of your surroundings.
You are immune to poison and disease.

negative.title: Prone
descriptions: Attackers within 5 feet make attacks against you at Advantage.
Attackers farther than 5 feet make attacks against you at Disadvantage.
You can only move by crawling, at half speed.

negative.title: Unconscious
descriptions: Attackers within 5 feet automatically critically hit when they attack you.
You can't speak, and are unaware of your surroundings.

positive.title: Invisible
descriptions: For the purpose of hiding, you are heavily obscured.
